text:
iShares ® iShares Trust Supplement dated March
24, 2025 to the currently effective Summary
Prospectus, Prospectus and Statement of
Additional Information for the iShares
California Muni Bond ETF (CMF) (the “Fund”)
Effective at the March 31, 2025 rebalance of
the ICE AMT‑Free California Municipal Index
(the “Underlying Index”), the threshold size
requirements of qualifying securities in the
Underlying Index will be reduced from (a)
having at least $15 million currently
outstanding face value and being part of a
deal with an original offering size of $100
million to (b) having at least $5 million
currently outstanding face value and being
part of a deal with an original offering size
of at least $50 million. If you have any
questions, please call 1‑800‑iShares
(1‑800‑474‑2737).

iShares ®is a registered trademark of
BlackRock Fund Advisors and its affiliates.
                                 IS‑A‑CMF‑0325
                                              
        PLEASE RETAIN THIS SUPPLEMENT         
                                              
                                              
             FOR FUTURE REFERENCE
